Pi MusicBox Prerelease

MusicBox 0.6RC contains the following improvements:

  • Enhanced support for Raspberry Pi 2
  • Updated kernel
  • New version of the webinterface
  • Better support for soundcards (HifiBerry AMP), USB Audio fixed
  • Other bugfixes


Instructions

Download the image. It's about 292MB in (compressed) size; 1GB uncompressed.

  • musicbox0.6RC.zip (Fast mirror, Rackspace)

  • musicbox0.6RC.zip (from this site)

For installation and configuration, look at the homepage
